title: Any upcoming intern positions for the Lore Team?
body: I was wondering if RIOT had any internship positions open for their Lore/Story Team in the near future. I already checked the careers/internship page but nothing came up.

replies.body: Sounds like you've already seen it, http://www.riotgames.com/internship-program is the place to check for internships coming up though. Lore/Story related positions would be listed under 'Narrative', though at the moment at least Narrative's not a discipline that's looking for intern applications.
I think they need some new blood in the balance team.
